Conversations/Mods/Mistria_More_Dialogue: Oh, hey, [Ari]. What's up?
Hey, March! You're cute today!
Hey! Better now, for sure!
C-cute?
Well... I mean...
T-thanks... you're cute too.
Yeah. It's always nice speaking to you, [Ari].
You're looking very nice today.
I remember when you first came.
I really was a jerk, right?
I know it doesn't really change what happened, but...
I see now the great pearson you are.
And... I really hope we keep this relation we have.
[Ari], hey.
I've seen you forging sometimes...
You're really talented.
If you need any help or tips, I'm always here.
Oh... Hello, [Ari]...
March, are you okay?
You look kinda sad. Is everything okay?
Yeah, it's just...
Sometimes, I think I just don't deserve..., you know..., you.
I was such an idiot when you first arrive, and I treated you bad for so long...
And you only treated me well, gave me amazing gifts, and I just refused to accept I liked you in return.
Honestly, I don't know why you like me after all that.
Because I knew there was a softie underneath that attitude.
Because I challenged myself to make you like me, and I hate losing.
Because you're handsome, of course!
Well... I wouldn't say ''softie''...
But you really do make me feel comfortable, and I really know I can be just myself with you.
That sounds very softie for me.
If that's not softie, it's at least cute.
... M-maybe.
hehe. I think I was a tough one to win.
Still, I wish It had been easy.
No pain, no gain, right?
Me too, but I think It was all worth it.
heh. I think so.
It sure was.
Y-you... really think so?
Have you ever looked yourself in the mirror? You're gorgeous!
Of course! And I think two beautiful people like you and me really fit.
Well..., I'm glad you think so.
I think you're really beautiful too.
Hehe. We really do, right?
Anyways, Thanks for this chat. I really needed this. Thank you.
You're really special to me, [Ari], and I promise I'll never treat you like before.
Hey, babe, what's up?
I-I call you 'babe', right?
